docs.title: Home

docs.title: Commands

docs.text: Introdution Please setup Liqpay account in dashboard - https://www.liqpay.ua/ Setup Step 1: Open your Liqpay account settings https://www.liqpay.ua/en/admin/business Step 2: Go to "API" section Step 3: Set up parameters Availability of order_id Signature availability (signature) Step 4: Enter Trusted IP adresses from PayCore Trusted IP Step 5: Save settings. Copy Public and Private keys Step 6: Sing in to PayCore Dashboard https://dashboard.paycore.io/ Step 7: Go to "New connection" page Step 8: Ensure that You are at "Payment Providers" tab and find LiqPay in the list Step 9: Open connection form Step 10: Enter your keys. Choose provider's currencies. Save connection changes Success! You have connected LiqPay!
docs.title: Connect manual

docs.text: Please setup Liqpay account in dashboard - https://www.liqpay.ua/
docs.title: Introdution
Step 1: Open your Liqpay account settings
Step 4: Enter Trusted IP adresses from PayCore Trusted IP
Step 5: Save settings. Copy Public and Private keys
Step 6: Sing in to PayCore Dashboard
Step 8: Ensure that You are at "Payment Providers" tab and find LiqPay in the list
Step 10: Enter your keys. Choose provider's currencies. Save connection changes
